sentences.english: Malocclusion can be related to habits such as thumb sucking or premature loss of the deciduous (milk, baby) teeth.
sentences.chinese: 錯頜畸形與一些習慣如允吸大拇指乳牙過早脫落有關。

sentences.english: By age 3, your child should have a full set of 20 baby teeth.
sentences.chinese: 到三歲時，你的寶寶就能長全20顆乳牙了。

sentences.english: Periodontosis of confine green early days encroachs a few deciduous teeth only, place adventitious.
sentences.chinese: 侷限型青春前期牙周炎僅侵犯少數乳牙，部位不定。

sentences.english: Objective This study observed plaque distribution on primary dentition to offer more scientific toothbrushing instruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察分析全口乳牙的菌斑附着狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the features of primary tooth structure in hypophosphatasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察低磷酸酯酶症在乳牙結構上的表現。

sentences.english: This is a physiological phenomenon, which is replacing the so-called deciduous teeth.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種生理現象，這就是所謂的乳牙退換。

sentences.english: I never realized that baby teeth are so important.
sentences.chinese: 我過去一直沒有認識到乳牙是這麼重要。

sentences.english: However, the primary teeth that are absent of permanent successor will produce root re-sorption and eventually exfoliate.
sentences.chinese: 恆牙胚缺失的乳牙也會發生根吸收，導致乳牙脫落。

sentences.english: However, the primary teeth that are absent of permanent successor will produce root re-sorption and eventually exfoliate.
sentences.chinese: 恆牙胚缺失的乳牙也會發生根吸收，導致乳牙脫落。

sentences.english: In Mongolia, they put the baby tooth in the meat and feed it to the young dog.
sentences.chinese: 在蒙古，人們把乳牙放在小狗的狗食中。

sentences.english: Should sealants be put on baby teeth?
sentences.chinese: 乳牙也應該塗保護膠嗎？

sentences.english: As these teeth fall out . Our permanent teeth come through.
sentences.chinese: 等乳牙脫落後，恆牙開始生長。

sentences.english: Objective To observe osteoclasts on the resorbing surface of human deciduous teeth.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察人乳牙根吸收面的破骨細胞形態特點。

sentences.english: Time of eruption of deciduous teeth have a lot of individual differences.
sentences.chinese: 乳牙的萌出時間有很大的個體差異。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive effects of fluoride drop on dental caries for children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氟化鈉滴劑對兒童乳牙齲病的預防作用。

sentences.english: When deciduous teeth began to sprout, submaxilla starts to search for physical position.
sentences.chinese: 乳牙初萌下頜開始探索其生理位置。

definition: permanent tooth (as opposed to deciduous tooth 乳牙)/adult tooth
to grow replacement teeth (zoology)/to grow permanent teeth in place of milk teeth
caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
